src_original: tānadbhavandami sarvi āśaṣān kāyatu vācemanena prasanaḥ || 2 ||
eka rajāgrirameya buddhāna buddhasūtāna niṣarṇṇa kūmadhyā evama śeṣata dharmmāta dhātuṁ sarvvadhimūcyāmi pūrṇṇa jinebhiḥ || 4 ||
teṣūca akṣaya varṇṇa samudrā sarvvasva rāga samudrā rutebhiḥ ||
sarvajināna guṇanbhaṇa mānastā nsūgatāṁ stavamī aha sarvvān || 5 ||
pūṣpavarebhiḥ camālya varebhiḥ bāyabile pana chatraverebhiḥ |
dīpa vare bhiḥ vatravarebhiḥ pūjanate ṣūjinona karomi || 6 ||
vamtravarebhica gandha varebhiḥ cūrṇṇa paṭebhiḥ camerusamebhiḥ |
